<embed src="http://www.haofangyuan.net/youku/videoyk.jsp?id=XMTY5NDAwMjUwMA==" width="100%" height="800"  >








滤镜插件Nik Colloection[神器](http://brushes8.com/86468.html)






#0.Spider 框架

* url管理池,目标是每次出列的url是不重复的
  urlpool用队列`deque()`保证队尾进,队首出
  seenpool用集合`set()`保证没有重复,每个新的url都要先问seenpool,再放入seenpool和urlpool

* url下载器,目标获得可供解析的html_doc
  运用requests的get或者post得到response,放在r中
  response用`r.text`转换成html_doc,过程涉及编码的考虑

* html_doc解析器,目标获得所需标签tag或属性attrs
  运用`BeautifulSoup()`得到可用的类soup
  soup用`.find_all("tag",attrs=re.compile(""))`找到含所需属性的标签,放入box
  对box做for迭代,依次处理,或放入某列表,或写入文件,或保存入文件夹,或放入url管理池


#1.单页 图片 md

前提条件

* 网页是静态网，无登录验证

* 由requests抓取的`r.text`可以无乱码的print出来

实现效果

* 图片网页的图片并写入Markdown

版本A:完整思路
	
	#-*-coding:UTF-8-*-
	
	import requests
	from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

	linkpool = []
	mtext = []

	r = requests.get('http://guo.lu/')
	rtext = r.text
	soup = BeautifulSoup(rtext,"html.parser",from_encoding='utf-8')
	abox = soup.find_all("img")

	for eacha in abox:
		link = eacha["src"]
		link = "![](%s)"%link
		linkpool.append(link)

	mtext = str(linkpool)
	mtext = mtext.replace("', '","\n")

	f = open('C:/Users/keepd/Documents/mycode/new.md','w',encoding="UTF-8")
	f.write(mtext)
	f.close
	print("Bingo")

版本B:简洁版且与用户沟通

	#-*-coding:UTF-8-*-

	import requests
	from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
	
	url = input('请输入要爬取的网站：')
	r = requests.get(url)
	rtext = r.text
	soup = BeautifulSoup(rtext,"html.parser",from_encoding='utf-8')
	abox = soup.find_all("img")

	with open('C:/Users/keepd/Documents/mycode/new.md','a',encoding="UTF-8") as f:
		for eacha in abox:
		    link = eacha["src"]
		    link = "![](%s)"%link
		    f.write(link)

	print("Bingo")

版本C:把获取soup包装成一个函数

	#-*-coding:UTF-8-*-
	import requests
	from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

	starturl = 'http://guo.lu/'
	
	def get_soup(url):
	    r = requests.get(url)
	    if r.encoding is "ISO-8859-1":
	        r.encoding = "utf-8"
	    else:
	    	pass
	    rtext = r.text
	    soup = BeautifulSoup(rtext,"html.parser",from_encoding='utf-8')
	    return soup
	        
	soup = get_soup(starturl)
	abox = soup.find_all("img")

	with open('C:/Users/keepd/Documents/mycode/new.md','a',encoding="UTF-8") as f:
		for eacha in abox:
		    link = eacha["src"]
		    link = "![](%s)"%link
		    f.write(link)

	print("Bingo")

#2.单页 link 

前提条件

* rtext无乱码，是html文档

实现效果

* 集合seenpool里面是不重复的已阅连接，队列linkpool里是待发掘的不重复的link

* 获取图片网页的<code>&lt;a&gt;</code>中的链接地址
	
代码
	
        #-*-coding:UTF-8-*-
        import requests,re
        from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
        from collections import deque

        linkpool = deque()
        seenpool = set()
        inilink = 'http://guo.lu/'
        linkpool.append(inilink)

        counter = 0
        while linkpool and counter<=2:
		
		now = linkpool.popleft()
		r = requests.get(now)
		r.encoding="utf-8"
		rtext = r.text	

		soup = BeautifulSoup(rtext,"html.parser")
		abox = soup.find_all("a",href=re.compile(r"^http://guo.lu"))
		
		for eacha in abox:
			link = eacha["href"]
			if link not in seenpool:
				seenpool |= {link}
				linkpool.append(link)
				print(link)
			else:
				continue 

		counter = counter+1	

        seenpool = str(seenpool)
        linkpool = str(linkpool)
        print(seenpool,linkpool,counter)
        print("Bingo")

#3.单页 网盘 md
实现效果

* 天天美剧的单页百度网盘资源写入Markdown文档

代码

	#-*-coding:UTF-8-*-

	import requests,re
	from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

	now ='http://www.ttmeiju.com/meiju/Shameless.html'
	r = requests.get(now)
	rtext = r.text	
	soup = BeautifulSoup(rtext,"html.parser")
	abox = soup.find_all("a",href=re.compile(r"^http://pan.baidu.com"))

	with open('C:/Users/keepd/Documents/mycode/new.md','w',encoding='utf-8')as f:
		i=1
		for eacha in abox:
			link = eacha["href"]
			f.write("[网盘连接"+str(i)+"]("+str(link)+")</br>")
			i +=1
	print("Bingo")

#4.编码
实现效果

* 对于1的优化,包括编码和筛选

* 应对`r.text`解码出状况，直接定义`r.encoding="utf-8"`

* 在进行BeautifulSoup的`.find_all()`时，直接筛选出带路径`src`的<code>&lt;img&gt;</code>


版本A：连接全部放进linkpool,最后整体写入文件


	#-*-coding:UTF-8-*-

	import requests,re
	from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
	from collections import deque
	
	linkpool = deque()
	mtext = []
	
	r = requests.get('http://j.news.163.com/docs/27/2016031601/BI8800TL051684TB.html')
	r.encoding="utf-8"
	rtext = r.text
	
	soup = BeautifulSoup(rtext,"html.parser",from_encoding='utf-8')
	abox = soup.find_all("img",src=re.compile("^http.*jpg$"))
	for eacha in abox:
	    link = eacha["src"]
	    link = "![](%s)"%link
	    linkpool.append(link)
	  
	mtext = str(linkpool)
	mtext = mtext.replace("', '","\n")
	f = open('C:/Users/keepd/Documents/mycode/new.md','w',encoding="UTF-8")
	f.write(mtext)
	f.close
	print("Bingo")

版本B：连接每次迭代,直接写入文件

	#-*-coding:UTF-8-*-
	
	import requests,re
	from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
	from collections import deque
	from idlelib.IOBinding import encoding
	
	r = requests.get('http://j.news.163.com/docs/27/2016031601/BI8800TL051684TB.html')
	r.encoding="utf-8"
	rtext = r.text
	
	soup = BeautifulSoup(rtext,"html.parser",from_encoding='utf-8')
	abox = soup.find_all("img",src=re.compile("^http.*jpg$"))
	
	with open("C:/Users/keepd/Documents/mycode/new.md","a",encoding="utf-8") as f:
	    for eacha in abox:
	        link = eacha["src"]
	        link = "![](%s)"%link
	        link = str(link)
	        f.write(link)
	print("Bingo")

#5.翻页

实现效果

* 天天美剧按季资源可以翻页,把所有页面的网盘连接都写入Markdown
	
代码

	#-*-coding:UTF-8-*-

	import requests,re
	from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
	from collections import deque
	from idlelib.IOBinding import encoding

	start ='http://www.ttmeiju.com/meiju/Shameless.html'
	urlpool = deque()
	linkpool = []
	#初始化：入口,url池,link池

	def get_html():
	        now = urlpool.popleft()
	        r = requests.get(now)
	        r.encoding = 'utf-8'
	        rtext = r.text
	        soup = BeautifulSoup(rtext,"html.parser")
	        abox = soup.find_all("a",href=re.compile(r"^http://pan.baidu.com"))
	        for eacha in abox:
	            link = eacha["href"]
	            linkpool.append(link)
	#抓一个html文档中的link放入池中

	def get_url(pageid):
	    url = start+"?page=%s"%pageid
	    urlpool.append(url)
	#抓一个网页的url放入池中

	pagestart = 1 
	pageend = 3
	for n in range(pagestart,pageend):
	    get_url(n)
	#迭代进行翻页

	while urlpool:
	    get_html()
	#url池中还有货就循环

	f = open('C:/Users/keepd/Documents/mycode/new.md','w',encoding="utf-8")
	for i in range(1,len(linkpool)):
		f.write("[网盘地址"+str(i)+"]("+str(linkpool[i])+")</br>")
	f.close
	print("Bingo")
	#最后写markdown文件

#6.小小Tips之编码

* 默认情况下,忽略,不写`r.encoding = "utf-8"`,如果网页本身是gbk还写入此句,那么用BeautifulSoup的`.get_text()`就会得到中文乱码

* 若经python查询`>>>r.enconding`得到ISO-8859-1的编码,那么可以在`r.text`之前使用`r.encoding = "utf-8"`

#7.下载
A:图片

	#-*-coding:UTF-8-*-

	import requests
	from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

	r = requests.get('http://guo.lu/')
	rtext = r.text
	soup = BeautifulSoup(rtext,"html.parser",from_encoding='utf-8')
	abox = soup.find_all("img")

	for eacha in abox:
	    link = eacha["src"]
	    blink = requests.get(link).content
	    with open('c:\myimg'+'/'+link[-12:],'wb') as f:
	        f.write(blink)
	    #将获得的图片连接转为Bytes Data即blink,`link[-12]`是以倒数12个字符命名
	print("Bingo")


B:音乐


	#-*-coding:UTF-8-*-

	import requests

	url = input("请输入地址")
	r = requests.get(url)
	rtext = r.content

	with open('c:\myimg'+'/'+'music.mp3','wb') as f:
	    f.write(rtext)

	print("Bingo")

C:视频

	
	#-*-coding:UTF-8-*-

	import requests

	url = input("请输入地址")
	r = requests.get(url)
	rtext = r.content

	with open('c:\myimg'+'/'+'movie.mp4','wb') as f:
	    f.write(rtext)

	print("Bingo")

D:下载函数

	


#8.小小Tips之数据

* 图片数据是Bytes Data,包含在绝对的url地址中,所有“下载保存”图片,就是把Bytes Data以`wb`形式写入文件夹

#9.小小Tips之Spider

* 参考No.6来决定要不要运用`r.encoding="utf-8"`

* 进行`soup.find_all("tag")`时,用`attrs=re.compile("")`同步筛选符合条件的<code>&lt;tag&gt;</code>以此来避免for迭代时抛出异常

#10.微博 单图

* 微博入口用移动版`http://weibo.cn`,后面可添加目标用户名例如`/u/1900886092`

* 抠下所有单图原图

代码

	#-*-coding:UTF-8-*-

	import requests,re
	from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

	r = requests.get('http://weibo.cn/mfashionchina')
	rtext = r.text
	soup = BeautifulSoup(rtext,"html.parser",from_encoding='utf-8')
	abox = soup.find_all("a",href=re.compile(r"^http://weibo.cn/mblog/oripic"))

	for eacha in abox:
	    link = eacha["href"]
	    print(link)
	print("Bingo")

#11.小小Tips之windows打开.py文件

* 方法A 在`python35`文件中新建`mycode`文件,在`mycode`文件中打开`cmd`,输入`python xx.py`

* 方法B 在IDEL中打开`open xx.py`文件,然后`run module`

#**Template**

##**A = SKU**
父 = Dproduct000

子 = Dproduct000-color-size

父为一种产品，子为产品的分类。product = 产品英文名缩写。

同sku的为一个产品页面，同color属性的为一个选择项，不同的size在多选框中显示。

##**B = 产品呈现的名字**

罗列关键字

##**D = ID Type**

固定为`GCID`

##** E = 商标**

固定为`Kingsnower`

##**F = 详情描述**

自拟

##**G = Item Type Keyword**

卖家 - 库存 - 批量... - 下载... - 点击选择分类中的有效值

##**H = Model Number**

固定为`YYMMDDsku00`

`sku` = **A**中无product的缩略版。父为`00`，子顺序+1

##**I = 更新模式**

固定为`Delete`or`PartialUpdate`or`空白`
##**J = 原价**

自拟

##**M  = 最晚发货日期**

固定为`3`

##**Q = 库存**

固定为`500`

##**R = 促销价**

固定为`XX.X9`

##**S = 促销开始时间**

固定为`20XX/X/X`月和日不用补零

##**T = 促销结束时间**

固定为`20XX/X/X`月和日不用补零

##**V = 每个包裹的数量**

固定为`1`

##**AK~AD = 产品呈现的特点**

自拟4个句子

##**AP = 搜索用的关键词**

自拟以`，bp`间隔

##**AQ = 主图地址**

主图为左侧缩略图第一个

##**AR = 其他图地址**

顺序为左侧缩略图第二个

##**AU = 选择分类图标地址**

固定为`AQ列的主图地址`

##**BC = 亲子关系**

固定为`parent`or`child`,一父多子

##**BD = 父SKU**

父的固定为`空白`，所有子的固定为`A列的父SKU`

##**BE = 产品关系**

固定为`Variation`

##**BF = 分类依据**

固定为`sizecolor`

##**BT = 颜色名字**

常用

Red  Pink  Orange  Yellow  Green  Olive  Blue  Navy  Purple  Gray  Black  White  

##**BX = 性别**

固定为`womens`or`mens`

##**CS = 尺寸**

固定为`S`or`M`or`L`

!!''标题''

* 代码：`!!''标题''`
* 说明：英文状态下的感叹号`!`表示标题等级，一对两个单引号`''XXXX''`表示粗体

!!''标签''

* 代码：`[[替标签名换]]`
* 说明：自动可能会斜体
!!''图片''

* 代码：`[image[替url换]]`
* 说明：堆糖 网易相册 微博相册 均可

!!''无序列表''

* 代码：`*bpXXXX`
* 说明：bp代表空格

!!''视频''

!!!优酷

* 代码：`<embed src="http://www.haofangyuan.net/youku/videoyk.jsp?id=替视频ID换" width="100%" height="800"  >`
* 说明：视频ID来源于原链接`id_`与`.html`之间所有代码，包括==之类的

!!''待办事项''

!!!举个栗子 [[任务列表]]

* step1 设置两个标签`task`和`done`，可以在下方添加颜色，用`#XXXXXX`表示
* step2 为所需要代办的标签设置tag书签`task`即可
* step3 在想要呈现的地方，罗列标记为`task`的标签，代码：`<$list filter="[!has[draft.of]tag[task]!tag[done]sort[created]]">

<$checkbox tag="done"> <$link to={{!!title}}><<toc-caption>></$link></$checkbox>

</$list>`
* step4 罗列标记为`done`的标签，代码：`
<$list filter="[!has[draft.of]tag[task]tag[done]sort[created]]">

<$checkbox tag="done"> ~~<$link to={{!!title}}><<toc-caption>></$link>~~</$checkbox>

</$list>`
